channel.title: Spell Casting
channel.description:
Whenever I cast a spell, like ice blitz, on the second or third time of casting it, it walks up to the person.. I want to be able to stand at a spot, and cast it on a person instead of walking up to them. If there is any way to fix this, please tell me, or link to a tutorial. Thanks!
Anyone know?

item.title: Spell Casting
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I don’t think you can fix this, since it was never meant to be fixed. This happens in RS2 aswell, if you cast a spell to quickly, your character will move within 1 square away from the other character your fighting.

It’s all in the timing.

Read full topic
